abstract: Pres Obama will issue an executive order that the administration hopes will help resolve a growing number of critical shortages of vital medicines used to treat life-threatening illnesses; order is part of a series of executive orders involving disparate issues that are intended to show that Obama is working to resolve the nation's problems despite a Congress largely paralyzed by partisanship.
snippet: An executive order by the Obama administration offers drug manufacturers and wholesalers a helping hand and a gloved fist in efforts to resolve shortages that have worsened greatly in recent years.
lead_paragraph: An executive order by the Obama administration offers drug manufacturers and wholesalers a helping hand and a gloved fist in efforts to resolve shortages that have worsened greatly in recent years.

headline.main: Obama Tries to Speed Response to Shortages in Vital Medicines
headline.print_headline: Obama Tries to Speed Response To Shortages in Vital Medicines
headline.seo: Medicine Shortages Addressed in Obama Executive Order
